li.a: Student of the Month & Staff Spotlight

div.class: col-xs-12 col-sm-12 col-md-8 col-lg-8 backgroundcolor middle-content-panel

span.p: We know that during these uncertain times, we are all finding difficulty in our lives in one form or another. Please consider these resources that might help you and your family out:

I want to thank you for your efforts in supporting your child through the mandated closure. At this point, due to the Governor's mandated Safer at Home Mandate, we will not be returning to school prior to April 24th. Once more information is provided we will update you accordingly.

div.a: April SEL Word of the Month-RESPONSIBILITY

p.b: Spencer’s Social and Emotional Learning word for April is RESPONSIBILITY.
